item.title: Erin add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "Those who have the ability to be grateful are the ones who have the ability to achieve greatness." -- Steve Maraboli

item.title: Erin add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "Just an observation: it is impossible to be both grateful and depressed. Those with a grateful mindset tend to see the message in the mess. And even though life may knock them down, the grateful find reasons, if even small ones, to get up." -- Steve Maraboli

item.title: Erin add a quote by Dietrich Bonhoeffer
item.description: "In normal life we hardly realize how much more we receive than we give, and life cannot be rich without such gratitude. It is so easy to overestimate the importance of our own achievements compared with what we owe to the help of others." -- Dietrich Bonhoeffer

item.title: Erin add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "Be happy with who you are and what you do, and you can do anything you want." -- Steve Maraboli

item.title: Erin add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "Although time seems to fly, it never travels faster than one day at a time. Each day is a new opportunity to live your life to the fullest. In each waking day, you will find scores of blessings and opportunities for positive change. Do not let your TODAY be stolen by the unchangeable past or the indefinite future! Today is a new day!" -- Steve Maraboli
